2017 Will Be Remembered As The Year Of Bitcoin

▪ Responsible for the public and professional site of MLSListings.com.▪ Launched the redesigned Property Search with very limited development resources. It's a responsive website with mobile adaptive enhancements and got a Net Promoter Score (NPS) 16 points higher than the precedent.▪ Defined product vision, prioritized product roadmap & backlog, and provided business requirements for the MLSListings Websites Revamp project.▪ Conducted quantitative analysis on CRM cases and Google Analytics traffic data, as well as intensive interviews with MLS industry insiders and real estate agents to identify major user pain points and key enhancement areas of MLSListings websites.▪ Implemented the CRMLS data integration on MLSListings.com and increased listing count by 600%.▪ Supported MLSListings.com security upgrade and planned & executed risk mitigation.

▪ Managed Account Balances, Positions, and Summary feature as well as International/UK Client and Global Investing user experience of multiple online platforms, which includes Schwab.com desktop/mobile site and iPhone/iPad/Android app. ▪ Spearheaded the Balances Redesign project from vision to delivery of all new key features that never before provided on Schwab.com. Managed competing priorities, team composition changes, and major resource variations. Planned and executed the product release/client pilot according to roadmap. Effectively influenced the Agile Scrum team and other business partners to achieve the best practical performance. The redesigned product resulted in a client satisfaction rate twice better than those of similar projects.▪ Led and delivered various web development projects targeting US or international clients, including client self-service online transfer and paperless features (e.g., eStatements, eConfirms, Year-end Gain Loss Reports), enhancements of trading applications & research functionalities, and marketing content & campaigns.▪ Worked with a third party partner to implement the Research Offshore Mutual Fund feature, the only Schwab.com functionality unique to international clients.▪ Administered translation vendors and the production of Investing Insight Chinese Newsletter. Built hands-on experience in using the SDL translation management system.
▪ Developed and implemented localization strategies for the Chinese trading site.

▪ Efficiently established the global peripheral procurement website in six months.▪ Constructed the peripheral product information sharing site by MediaWiki in three months. It won the third place in Advantech's Global Wiki Competition.

▪ Oversaw all content products, which accounted for over 85% of Sina US’ site traffic.▪ Led a virtual product team of eight by leveraging resources in the China and Taiwan office.▪ Supervised web analytics & marketing surveys and coordinated website promotion campaigns.

Joseph is a great product owner.  He works very hard to prepare himself to lead the team from a product owner perspective.  He spends many, many hours before formal project kickoff.  He'd talk to designers, to get their feel for the overall design, and make his inputs known to them.  Then he'd spend many hours with tech lead/architects to understand the constraints on a system.  And obviously he works hard to understand management perspective of the product.  When he has all of those down, then would he prepare his documentations and draft user stories to present to entire team.Joseph is very hard working individual, very smart and can understand technology challenges--which as a technologist I really appreciate.

Joseph is a very goal-driven person with great working ethics and integrity. He has broad knowledge in reporting, web content development, and project management.Joseph possesses many qualities of a leader. His passion for news reporting and his great spirit have always had a positive influence on people around him. He is intelligent and committed to work, and he has great interpersonal skills. He always sets high self-standards and knows what he wants. In his writing he demonstrated the high analytical ability and reasonable skepticism.Joseph always strives for improvement and welcomes challenges. When he first arrived in the United States and took the reporter job, he chose to cover the beats on local governments and civil affairs in the San Francisco South Bay Area in addition to the Chinese community news, so that he could push himself to learn and understand the mainstream community faster. Despite the fact that journalists in Chinese media often got better recognition by covering Chinese Community news, he enjoyed the challenges and always delivered outstanding stories to the readers.

summary: - EXTENSIVE WORK EXPERIENCE IN:  ▪ Agile Online Product/Project Management (CSPO & PMP Certified): Define & articulate the product vision, manage the product roadmap & backlog, and lead the product team as a product owner▪ Web Content Development/Localization and International Business        ▪ Digital User Experience Design and Testing, including mobile web and iOS/Android app▪ Internet Consulting▪ Web Analytics/Online Survey▪ Search Engine Optimization (SEO)▪ Quantitative & Qualitative Analysis/Research▪ Financial Services (Series 7 & 63 Licensed)▪ Real Estate/Residential Properties▪ Vendor Relationship Management▪ Staff Recruitment/Supervision/Training ▪ Mass Media (Newspaper, TV, & Radio)- Goal-driven self-starter that thrives on cross-functional & virtual teamwork and a fast-paced work environment- Strong strategic thinking, communication, adaptability, and analytical & problem solving skills - Superior execution and attention to detail. Proven ability to manage competing priorities and risks- Fast learner, tech savvy, and always enjoy trying new things- Diverse exposure in the United States, Taiwan, and China with native fluency in Mandarin Chinese
